Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Suffolk to establish a water quality restoration fund to be financed by a water quality restoration fee on water usage in the county
Summary: Enacts the "Suffolk county water quality restoration act"; authorizes the county of Suffolk to establish a water quality restoration fund to be financed by a water quality restoration fee on water usage in the county; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the county of Suffolk to establish a water quality restoration fund to be financed by a water quality restoration fee on water usage in the county; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
